paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

: 256

subSubSection.paragraph:
NOTES : (a)
Vitzthum ( 1941 : 765 )
,
Baker & Wharton ( 1952 : 89 )
,
Evans ( 1957 a: 226 )
and
Schweizer ( 1961 : 116 )
considered
Episeius
to be a junior synonym of
Platyseius Berlese. We
adopted the interpretation of
Evans & Hyatt ( 1960 : 49 )
,
Lindquist & Evans ( 1965 : 37 )
,
Karg ( 1981 : 54 )
and Halliday et al . ( 1998 : 20 ), considering it to be a junior synonym of
Cheiroseius
. (b) According to Halliday et al . ( 1998 : 20 ),
Episeius
is the senior name available for
Cheiroseius ( Posttrematus )
.
